Topic.Title: 15% growth in profits & revs == + $5 in share price: $56 + 5 = $61

Message.Msg: Hope Ebay hits $60 next week. Discovey PayPal deal increasing 10x has had so far a negative impact on stock pirce from $58 to $51. Go figure

Topic.Title: Still can figure why Ebay not in $80s?

Message.Msg: I still say Ebay will hit $80s this year and maybe be the next $100+ internet stock

Message.Title: mobile shopping Ebay/PayPal #1 @ 17%
Message.Msg: In March 2013. 17.1% of U.S. smartphone owners used the app from eBay Inc.; 13.5% of smartphone owners used the app from Amazon; 10.9% of U.S. smartphone owners used the app from Groupon; 8.3% of smartphone owners used Apple Inc.â€™s Passbook mobile wallet app; 6.7% of smartphone owners used the app from Craigslist
No wonder why so many eBay buyers don't read the item listings and beat sellers up for issues that could have been resolved by reading the listing.
